### createAliasScope() {#ae7850c6f16a34372cc279c562db8fae3}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MDNode &#42; MDBuilder::createAliasScope (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; Domain)</>}>
Return metadata appropriate for an alias scope node with the given name.

This may be identified (uniqued) with other scopes with the same name and domain.

### createAnonymousAliasScope() {#a29982864b11594aec54699f962f650ec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MDNode &#42; llvm::MDBuilder::createAnonymousAliasScope (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; Domain, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>())</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Return metadata appropriate for an alias scope root node.

Each returned node is distinct from all other metadata and will never be identified (uniqued) with anything else.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/mdbuilder-h/#l00174">174</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/mdbuilder-h">MDBuilder.h</a>.

### createBranchWeights() {#a75043d12a76b84200e9ed593719dc5eb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MDNode &#42; MDBuilder::createBranchWeights (uint32&#95;t TrueWeight, uint32&#95;t FalseWeight, bool IsExpected=false)</>}>
Return metadata containing two branch weights.

<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="TrueWeight">the weight of the true branch</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="FalseWeight">the weight of the false branch</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Do">these weights come from &#95;&#95;builtin&#95;expect&#42;</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

## Protected Member Functions

### createAnonymousAARoot() {#a1d88e43189490975b0f361a491275bf4}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MDNode &#42; MDBuilder::createAnonymousAARoot (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> Name=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42; Extra=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Return metadata appropriate for a <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a> root node (scope or TBAA).

Each returned node is distinct from all other metadata and will never be identified (uniqued) with anything else.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/mdbuilder-h/#l00153">153</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/mdbuilder-h">MDBuilder.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/mdbuilder-cpp/#l00194">194</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/mdbuilder-cpp">MDBuilder.cpp</a>.
